import React, { Component } from 'react'; import { Form } from 'react-bootstrap'; import DatePicker from "react-datepicker"; export class Product extends Component { state = { startDate: new Date() }; render() { const styles = { image: { height: 70, marginRight: 20 } }; const product = { title: "Product title", code: " 13t77fvtf4 ", imageUrl: "https://www.pngplay.com/wp-content/uploads/12/Joystick-Transparent-File-Clip-Art.png", price: 77.99, category: "Product category" } const categories_list = () => { let categories = [] for (let i = 0; i < 12; i++) { categories.push(
  • Category({i + 1})
      {subcategory(i + 1)}
    • ) } return categories; } return ( <>

    Product / Product details

    {product.title}

    Product Information

    code: {product.code}

    Address

    ) } } export default Product;
